page.title: 16Public Transport
page.content: Buses provide the main form of public transport in the area,the biggest operator being {Crosville}a subsidiary of the{National Bus Company}.Its green painted buses cover all of Anglesey and mainland Gwynedd as well as the North Wales coast and the north west of England. Several private companies also run local services i.e. to villages within a radius of about 15 miles of Bangor. The main services are provided by {Deiniolen Motors and Purple Motors.} The latter runs buses to{Bethesda. } Apart from local services buses also run from Bangor to such places as Chester,London,the north of England and South Wales. The rail service is mainly based on long distance runs e.g London,York and Manchester with a few small units running to Holyhead and Liandudno.
